step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move them behind your head.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide. Keep your wrists from bending too much as you reach back.
Holding the stretch well. Be mindful of your wrists and try to keep them aligned with your forearms.
Returning to the start position nicely. Pay attention to keeping your elbows from flaring out too much.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer when moving your hands up and behind your head. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
